title: Genetic Algorithms
subject: Artificial Intelligence
theory:
Inspired by Evolution. Optimization search. 
1. Create population.
2. Select best (Survival of fittest).
3. Breed (Crossover).
4. Mutate (Random change).
5. Repeat.

interview_questions.question: Why Mutation?
interview_questions.answer: To prevent getting stuck in local optima. Maintains diversity.
